method.text: Whisk together the egg yolks, and sugar until pale and fluffy. Soak the gelatine in the cold water.
Place the milk in a pan and bring to the boil. Add milk to the egg yolk mixture. Return to the heat, stirring and cooking very gently for 3-5 min until the mixture coats the back of a spoon.
Melt the soaked gelatine in a heatproof bowl set over a pan of simmering water. Pour into the sauce mixture, stirring until the gelatine is dissolved. Strain the mixture and cool slightly.
Liquidise the raspberries. Strain through a sieve. Add to the milk mixture. Finally, fold in the whipped cream. Pour the mixture into moulds and chill until firm.
Decorate with fresh raspberries and serve chilled.
